364b3(brgyad stong pa): gnyis pa/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor cing mod la bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos gang ba/ grong bar dang srang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa lnga brgya dag gis ri mor/
364b4(brgyad stong pa): bris pa bzhin du gtams pa/ khyogs khri nyam mi ngab/ bar bar dag tu zam pa btags pa/ legs par byas pa mthong ngo // de'i dbus kyi bzhi mngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
364b5(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos kyi khri la 'dug nas/ 'khor brgya phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/ chos
364b6(brgyad stong pa): 'chad pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang / bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong
364b7(brgyad stong pa): nas 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gi me cha'o snyam nas// de nas shing rta de
365a1(brgyad stong pa): las babs pa dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo dang / bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang mnyam du shing rta lus babs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
365a2(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te bkod pa tshad med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
365a3(brgyad stong pa): 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ches 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po sna bdun las byas pa tsan
365a4(brgyad stong pa): dan dmar pos brgyan cing / mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'i gru bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhi bzhag par gyur te/ de dag sgron ma'i bya ba byed
365a5(brgyad stong pa): do bdug spros kyi snong dngul las byas pa bzhi'ang phyogs bzhir rabatugs te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir/ a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis
365a6(brgyad stong pa): bdug par byed do// khang bu brtsegs pa de'i dbus su rin po che sna dun gyi khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgrom bzhi bzhag nas/ de'i nong du shes rab kye pha rol tu phyin pa
365a7(brgyad stong pa): gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris pa bcug ste/ khang bu brtsegs pa de'ang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa 'phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub
365b1(brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang bu brtsegs pa de bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong / lha stong phrag dra/
365b2(brgyad stong pa): ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi phye ma dang / lha'i dngul gyi phyi ma dag gis khang bu brtsegs
365b3(brgyad stong pa): pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo // lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong zhing thos nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
365b4(brgyad stong pa): tu ngus/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i dbang po khyod lha stong phrag du ma dag dang lhan cig rin po che'i khang bu brtsegs pa 'di la ci'i phyir me tog man dar ba dang /
365b5(brgyad stong pa): tsan dan gyi phye ma dag gis 'thor zhing / mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan 'di dag kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces smras pa dang / lha'i/
365b6(brgyad stong pa): dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems
365b7(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sangs
366a1(brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos thams cad dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ba yin na/ khyod kyis mi shes sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
366a2(brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum
366a3(brgyad stong pa): yongs su 'dren pa de gang na bzhugs/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de ni khang bu brtsegs pa 'di'i nang na gser gyi glegs bam la bai DUR+Ya bzhu bas bris nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
366a4(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rgyu rim pa bdun gyis btab nas bzhag ste/ nges kyis khyod la bstan par dka' 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
366a5(brgyad stong pa): rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dag dang tshogs nas/ de dag gis me tog dang / me tog 'phreng gi chun po dang / gos rin po rje dang / bdug bya dang /
366a6(brgyad stong pa): dang me tog 'phreng dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog ji snyed thogs te 'ongs pa de dag
366a7(brgyad stong pa): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas te/ de dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir cha shas kyis bzhag go//
366b1(brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / thug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gang/
366b2(brgyad stong pa): dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sngar mchod pa byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der
366b3(brgyad stong pa): dong ste phyin nas chos la mchod pa nyid kyi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang /
366b4(brgyad stong pa): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / gser dang / dngul gyi me tog dag gis gto
366b5(brgyad stong pa): mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas me tog de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi spyi bo'i steng du me tog gi khang pa
366b6(brgyad stong pa): brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur to// gser dang dngul gyi me tog de dag nam mkha' la gzhal yas khang 'dra bar 'dug par gyur to// chos gos dang / gos rin po che de dag kyang rin
366b7(brgyad stong pa): po che sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi dkyil 'khor 'dug pa 'dra bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis/
367a1(brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te ngo mtshar to// byang chub sem/
367a2(brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing / 'di ltar mthu che/ 'di ltar gzi brjid cha ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang rdzu
367a3(brgyad stong pa): 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa 'di 'dra na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ci 'dra bar 'gyur snyam mo// de nas tshong dben
367a4(brgyad stong pa): gyi bu mo la sogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba skyes nas/ de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang
367a5(brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag cag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
367a6(brgyad stong pa): pa'i sangs rgyas su gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis chos gang thob par gyur
367a7(brgyad stong pa): pa 'di lta bu'i chos rnams thob par gyur cig/ bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na'ang 'di lta bu'i chos rnams mngon sum du gyur cig/ shes rab kyi
367b1(brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la'ang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bkur sti byed pa 'di bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkur sri byed/
367b2(brgyad stong pa): par shog cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ji ltar ston pa de bzhin du bdag cag kyang skye bo mang po la ston par gyur cig/ ji ltar byang chub sa sa
367b3(brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag cag kyang shes
367b4(brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing yongs su rdzogs par shog cig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
367b5(brgyad stong pa): rtag tu ngu dang / tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
367b6(brgyad stong pa): 'phags la'ang bkur stir byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te zhes byed cing thal mo sbyar te/ phyogs gcig
367b7(brgyad stong pa): tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad/
368a1(brgyad stong pa): ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di la bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol zhing 'brog dgon par phyin pa na sa thos pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song zhig
368a2(brgyad stong pa): dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos par 'gyur ro zhes bdag gis sgra de thos nas/ shar phyogs ga la ba der logs su mchis nas 'di snyam du bsam te/ bdag gis sgra la/
368a3(brgyad stong pa): ji srid cig tu mchi bar bgyi/ su las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba ma dris so snyam ste/ des bdag yid mi bde zhing shin tu gdung bar gyur nas/ sa phyogs
368a4(brgyad stong pa): nyid du nyin mtshan bdun 'das te/ de ltar shin tu gdung bas zas la sems pa ni ma byung gi/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba' zhig yid la bgyis te/ ji srid cig tu ma
368a5(brgyad stong pa): bar bgyi ba dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di su las mnyan cing rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de la ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs
368a6(brgyad stong pa): shig byung ste/ des 'di skad gsung ngo // rigs kyi bu khyod 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar song dang / grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
368a7(brgyad stong pa): chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang ba mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de las bdag gis 'di thos nas/ ji ltar gas
368b1(brgyad stong pa): ba banir du shar phyogs gal ba der logs su zhugs te mchis pa dang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong sde mthong ma thag tu bdag la bde ba 'di lta bu skyes pang /
368b2(brgyad stong pa): byung te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin te/ bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba des khyab par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par thong /
368b3(brgyad stong pa): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos so// de nyan pa ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo mang po skyes par gyur to// bdag de na mchis pa na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
368b4(brgyad stong pa): 'das rnams kyis dbugs dbyung bar mdzad de/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// khyod kyi ting nge 'dzin 'di dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la
368b5(brgyad stong pa): gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bdag la shin tu legs par bstan nas mi snang bar gyur to//
368b6(brgyad stong pa): bdag kyang ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas 'di snyam du bsams te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhung snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di
368b7(brgyad stong pa): snyam du bsams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas
369a1(brgyad stong pa): pa la shin tu bslabs pa lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa de bdag la ston par 'gyur ro snyam nas/
369a2(brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud pa bdag 'dri na/ ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa 'tshal/
369a3(brgyad stong pa): cing de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / gang du bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste/
369a4(brgyad stong pa): sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
369a5(brgyad stong pa): po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du'ang ma bzhud de/ de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos so// de bzhin nyid gang yin
369a6(brgyad stong pa): ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong ba
369a7(brgyad stong pa): 'phang 'gro ba med de/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gang yin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu myong ba nyid lani 'ang ba'am 'gro ba med de/ gong panyid gang yin pa don de bzhin gshegs
369b1(brgyad stong pa): ba'o// rigs kyi bu ji lta ba bzhin la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ ji lta ba bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro med de/
369b2(brgyad stong pa): 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la ni 'ang ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs
369b3(brgyad stong pa): kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gud na med de/
369b4(brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid gcig pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la gnyis su byar med do//
369b5(brgyad stong pa): rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu nyi mas gdungs pas/ sos ka'i zla ba
369b6(brgyad stong pa): tha ma nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe/ smig rgya g.yo ba mthong nas/ de chub tung ngo zhes de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu gang nas 'ongs/ gang du song / chu na
369b7(brgyad stong pa): phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ lde phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ nub phyogs kyi rgya mtsho 'am/ byang phyogs kyi rgya mtsho gang du song / rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am/
370a1(brgyad stong pa): 'gro ba lta ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu de nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis smig tu g.yo ba mthong nas/
370a2(brgyad stong pa): chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyed kyi/ de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi bu gang
370a3(brgyad stong pa): dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ sgrar mngon par chags par byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am/ bzhud par rtog go/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon//
370a4(brgyad stong pa): pa'am/ bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can zhes bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu da du med pa la chur 'du shes skyong
370a5(brgyad stong pa): do de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur me lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu
370a6(brgyad stong pa): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am/ bzhung ba med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu mi byed pas sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta'i tshogs sam/ shing du
370a7(brgyad stong pa): tshogs sam/ dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la byon pa 'am/ bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste/ des
370b1(brgyad stong pa): narjes drug nyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gram/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ bzhi 'am/ snga'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum cu 'am/ bani bcu'am/
370b2(brgyad stong pa): bcu 'am/ de las ldag pa zhig mthong ba las sang ba dang / des de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon//
370b3(brgyad stong pa): gang du bzhud/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam la chos gang yang grub pa mi gda' 'o// rmi lam ni brdzun te/ yang dag pa ma lags so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de
370b4(brgyad stong pa): bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pas rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ji lta ba
370b5(brgyad stong pa): bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni/ ming mtshan gyi sku dang / gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/ de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhung bar
370b6(brgyad stong pa): rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang / bzhud par 'dod pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo de dag thams cad 'khor ba 'gro ba drug por dong ba/ 'dong ba/ 'dod bar 'gyur ba'o// de
370b7(brgyad stong pa): ngag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos thams cad rmi lam
371a1(brgyad stong pa): lta bu la/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni/ chos gang la'ang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye/
371a2(brgyad stong pa): ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go/ gang dag chos gang la'ang 'ong ba 'am/ 'gro ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag
371a3(brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par mi rtog go/ gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta bur rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla
371a4(brgyad stong pa): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par za ste/ de/
371a5(brgyad stong pa): ngag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma 'ongs/ lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / phyogs mtsham
371a6(brgyad stong pa): dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu gang nas kyang ma 'ongs mod kyi/ sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par
371a7(brgyad stong pa): 'byung ba ma yin gyi/ rgyu dang / rkyen dang / bzhi la rag las pa yin te/ de la brten nas 'byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gags pa'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang mi 'pho mod kyi/ rjen
371b1(brgyad stong pa): ngag yod na rin po che dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyen de dag med na rin po che dag rab tu dbye ba'ang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku mngon par grub pa'ang
371b2(brgyad stong pa): gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang du'ang ba bzhung ngo // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi su rgyu med pa'ang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin pas
371b3(brgyad stong pa): rgyu dang rkyen la rag las pa sngon gyi 'dzin las rnam par smin pa'i rgyu las byung ba yin no// de dag kyang rkyen rnams yod na sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub
371b4(brgyad stong pa): ba'ang mi snang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na pi wang gi sgra 'byung ba'ang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ 'gags pa'i tshe'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro/ gang du'ang mi 'pho ste/ brten nas 'byung ba/
371b5(brgyad stong pa): rgyu la rag las pa'o// rkyen la rag las pa'o// 'di lta ste/ pi wang gi khog pa la brten/ pags pa la brten/ shing bu la brten/ rgyud la brten/ rgyud rten la rten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol
371b6(brgyad stong pa): ba la brten nas/ pi wang de las sgra 'byung ste/ sgra de'ang pi wang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / shing bu las ma byung / rgyung rten las ma byung /
371b7(brgyad stong pa): de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas sgra ma byung mod kyi/ de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang slar grag la/ sgra de 'gags pa na'ang gang du'ang mi 'gro ba de bzhin du/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas
372a1(brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa'ang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba du mas yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/
372a2(brgyad stong pa): rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/ rgyu med pa'ang ma yin no// rkyen med pa'ang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po tshogs pa las byung ba
372a3(brgyad stong pa): yin te/ de ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa med kyang gang du'ang mi bzhud de/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi
372a4(brgyad stong pa): bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyed kyis 'di bzhin du khong du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /
372a5(brgyad stong pa): 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro//
372a6(brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug
372a7(brgyad stong pa): tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul te/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad kyang dkrogs shing spa bko
372b1(brgyad stong pa): bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rtswa dang / shing gel ba dang / spyan dang / nags tshul ji skad cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sem/
372b2(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su rab tu 'drad par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang la 'thor cing me tog gi char dag kyang 'bab bo// lha'i dbang po
372b3(brgyad stong pa): byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i me tog gis 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu
372b4(brgyad stong pa): 'thor zhing tshig 'di skad zer te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang don dam pa las byung ba'i gtam 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa/ gang 'jig tshogs la gnas
372b5(brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad kyis ma yin pa bstan pa thos so zhes zer ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
372b6(brgyad stong pa): po rtag tu ngus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bus g.yos pa chen po byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa
372b7(brgyad stong pa): rnams ma byon ma bzhud pa 'di khyod kyis dris te/ kho bos bstan pas srog chags brgya steng mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa
373a1(brgyad stong pa): yang dge bar rtogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyeng ba dang / srog chags drug zla bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdus med cing dris dang bras ba rnam par dag par/
373a2(brgyad stong pa): gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang / rangs pa rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
373a3(brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang / bzhud pa med pa bstan pa 'di dris pas sems can ji snyed kyi don byas par gyur pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag bla
373a4(brgyad stong pa): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phyir the tsom mi bya'o// bdag ni the tsom med
373a5(brgyad stong pa): par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro snyam pa dang / de dga' ba dang rangs pa de dang ldan pas/ tA la bdun tsam du nam mkha' la
373a6(brgyad stong pa): 'phags nas/ ta la bdun tsam na 'dug ste/ bdag nam mkha' la 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti bya'o snyam du sems so//
373a7(brgyad stong pa): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu mngon par 'phags pa mthong nas/ de'i sems kyis rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/
373b1(brgyad stong pa): del lha'i me tog sa nA dang ba dag byin te/ 'drenang du rigs kyi bu me tog 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur sti gyis shig 'di ni ngas khyod
373b2(brgyad stong pa): yongs su bzung ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus srog chags stong phrag mang po'i don byas te/ rigs kyi bu gang sems can thams cad kyi phyir de ltar khyod spro bar byed pa de lta bur bskal/
373b3(brgyad stong pa): pagrangs med dpag tu med par spro bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dga' 'o zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus
373b4(brgyad stong pa): lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi me tog de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gi
373b5(brgyad stong pa): lus kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mngon par bkab ste/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dang slan chad khyod kyi rim gro dang zham ring bgyi
373b6(brgyad stong pa): ba'i slad du bdag gi lus khyod la 'bul lo// nges bdag gi lus phul nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go
373b7(brgyad stong pa): de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang 'khor lnga brgya po de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod
374a1(brgyad stong pa): la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems/
374a2(brgyad stong pa): dpa' rnams la bkur stir bgyi/ de dag dang nye bar gyur par bgyi'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dgra tu drus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa sa/
374a3(brgyad stong pa): mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo dag khyed ngal lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pas gnas par byed na/ ngal lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang / bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo // phra
374a4(brgyad stong pa): mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug go/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pas ci 'dod pa bya bar bdag nyid 'bul lo//
374a5(brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan te/ shing rta lnga brgya'ang brgya
374a6(brgyad stong pa): nas thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la phul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'khor 'di dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya po 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyod pa'i/
374a7(brgyad stong pa): phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// de ltar byang chub sems
374b1(brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs/
374b2(brgyad stong pa): par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa nyan nus te/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
374b3(brgyad stong pa): ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/
374b4(brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu ma
374b5(brgyad stong pa): la sogs te bu mo lnga brgya po de dag dang / shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs/
374b6(brgyad stong pa): nas kyang rigs kyi bu rtag tu ngul slar byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang /
374b7(brgyad stong pa): nyi ma nub par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am//
375a1(brgyad stong pa): nyal bar byed pa de ni bdag gi mi cha la// 'din ma legs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi/
375a2(brgyad stong pa): bar du bdag 'greng ba 'am/ 'chag pa'i spyod lam gnyis kyis gnas par bya'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun
375a3(brgyad stong pa): gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin grangs med dpag tu med pa dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
375a4(brgyad stong pa): thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'ang lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod sems kyi
375a5(brgyad stong pa): rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / bro la brkam pa ma skyes te/ gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags nam ldang bar
375a6(brgyad stong pa): 'gyur/ bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi khri bsham na/
375a7(brgyad stong pa): bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag btab kyis/ legs par byugs la me tog sna tshogs gtor te/ sa phyogs gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
375b1(brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug par bya/ mye tog sna tshogs mngon par bkram snyam mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo
375b2(brgyad stong pa): la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i rjes su slob cing spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'das par byed de/ bya ba thams
375b3(brgyad stong pa): cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus rtswa'i sgra de thos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'dasas
375b4(brgyad stong pa): zhag bdun nA ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste/ langs nas grong khyer gyi dbus su 'dug ste/ chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes grag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
375b5(brgyad stong pa): tu dus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang dga' mgu yi rangs pa dang / rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig
375b6(brgyad stong pa): tu sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che thams cad kyis spra se be shams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos phung de/ stan gang la byang chub sa
375b7(brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs der chag
376a1(brgyad stong pa): chag gdab par 'dod na/ bdud sdig can gyis chu thams cad mi snang bar byas nas/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus chu ma rnyed nas/
376a2(brgyad stong pa): yid mi dga' zhing sems sdug bsngal te/ sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang / mchod pa de'ang mi mdzes par bya ba'i phyir/ chu de dag mi snang bar
376a3(brgyad stong pa): byas nas kun tu chu btsal na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gi lus phug la khrag gis sa
376a4(brgyad stong pa): phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs 'di ni rdul che ste/ rdul gyi khams 'di nas byung bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi
376a5(brgyad stong pa): lus la phog na mi rung gi/ bdag gi lus gdon mi za bar 'jig pa 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni sla'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i phyir/
376a6(brgyad stong pa): 'dod pa'i rgyus 'khor ba dag na/ bdag gi lus brgya stong mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni cir yang ma rung ngo snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
376a7(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po cag tu dus mtshon rnon po blangs te/ bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de kho ra khor lug tu chag chag btab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po /
376b1(brgyad stong pa): tu ngu'i rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag thams cad kyis kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nus rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de chag chag btang ste/
376b2(brgyad stong pa): gang de dag la bdud sdig can gyis dge ba'i phyogs kyi bar drang byeng pa'i glags rnyeng bar ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag sems gzhan du gyur pa
376b3(brgyad stong pa): med / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ji tsam du chos 'dod pa dang / ji tsam du yi dam la brtan pa dang / ji rgya
376b4(brgyad stong pa): du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
376b5(brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa las sems can thams cad thur par bya'o snyam du/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam du sems
376b6(brgyad stong pa): so de nas lnga'i dbang po brgya byin gyis khrag de dag thams cad rtswa'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chu de'i dring ma pa rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas sa phyogs de khor
376b7(brgyad stong pa): khor mug tu dpag cad 'argya tshang bar dris khyab bo// denas lha'i dbang po tu byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu legs
377a1(brgyad stong pa): so legs so// khyod kyi brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab bo// khyod kyi chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tshol ba bla na med do// rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
377a2(brgyad stong pa): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dong pa 'di lta bus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
377a3(brgyad stong pa): chub bsgrubs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni
377a4(brgyad stong pa): bting / sa phyogs 'di dag phyag bdar ni byas/ chag chag ni btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang dag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
377a5(brgyad stong pa): chos 'chang ba la gtor bar bya ba'i me tog de gang nas reng par 'gyur sam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di
377a6(brgyad stong pa): glang ces smras so// rigs kyi bu lha'i me tog man du rab 'di dag long la/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog bkram pa gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos
377a7(brgyad stong pa): ston cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa la la gtor cig/ ces des de la lha'i me tog man dar ba khal sdong byin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus me tog de dag blangs
377b1(brgyad stong pa): me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram pa byas so// me tog kha cig gis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub
377b2(brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang / ting nge 'dzin de las langs te chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas ldan bting ba la 'dug ste/ 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas/
377b3(brgyad stong pa): yongs su bskor cing bdun gyis bltas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ byang chub sems
377b4(brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig tu yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob do//
377b5(brgyad stong pa): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
377b6(brgyad stong pa): ba mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do//
377b7(brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad rlom sems med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med pa nyid do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med
378a1(brgyad stong pa): pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
378a2(brgyad stong pa): pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag
378a3(brgyad stong pa): pa med pa nyid do// nam mkha' mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sna tshogs pa nyid
378a4(brgyad stong pa): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid do// gzugs mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi
378a5(brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//
378a6(brgyad stong pa): sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
378a7(brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// nam mkha'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
378b1(brgyad stong pa): mu med pa nyid do// rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa nyid do//
378b2(brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par/
378b3(brgyad stong pa): 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
378b4(brgyad stong pa): phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa
378b5(brgyad stong pa): nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin skyes par gyur to// chos thams cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams
378b6(brgyad stong pa): cad rlom sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
378b7(brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad du med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' chu med/
379a1(brgyad stong pa): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgya mtsho bu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i/
379a2(brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
379a3(brgyad stong pa): sa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i
379a4(brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
379a5(brgyad stong pa): thams cad rang bzhin dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
379a6(brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ de la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag
379a7(brgyad stong pa): drug cu thob par gyur to// chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug
379b1(brgyad stong pa): cu thob thag tu/ sher phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / phyogs mtshams dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gad+hA'i klung gi rtse/
379b2(brgyad stong pa): ma snyer dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor zhing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di lta bu
379b3(brgyad stong pa): nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na da ltar nga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na chos
379b4(brgyad stong pa): ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi
379b5(brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chang pa bzhin no// de mang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thos pa rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur te/ gar skyes pa thams cad du'ang sangs rgyas dang mi 'bral ba
379b6(brgyad stong pa): 'gyur/ skye ba thams cad du'ang gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon sum du gyur pa de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang mi 'bral/
379b7(brgyad stong pa): bar 'gyur ro// des mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ ngal ba phun sum tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so// rab 'byor rnam grangs 'das kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di byang chub sems dpa' sems
380a1(brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin no// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
380a2(brgyad stong pa): shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dag
380a3(brgyad stong pa): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir zung zhig/ chongs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ gzhan/
380a4(brgyad stong pa): ngag la yang dag par rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis mnyan par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/
380a5(brgyad stong pa): bklag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ 'don par bya// lung nod par bya/ bstan par bya/ kha ton du bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ glegs bam chen po la yi ge gsal zhing rab tu gas
380a6(brgyad stong pa): bar legs par bris te/ me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / 'o
380a7(brgyad stong pa): zug su mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir bya/ bla mar bya/ ri mor bya/ mchod par bya/ drang bar bya/ gsol bar byaste/ kun dga' bo 'dzin nga'i gdams ngag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
380b1(brgyad stong pa): ku dga' bo 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so// bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi ston pa 'gas so//
380b2(brgyad stong pa): de nad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi sgom pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod
380b3(brgyad stong pa): kyis lus kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong bas rim gro byas te/ de lta bas na kun dga' bo ngad ltar bzhugs
380b4(brgyad stong pa): te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa'i sku 'di la khyod kyis dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dad pa dang / ri mor byas pa de bzhin du nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rim gror byos shig/ kun/
380b5(brgyad stong pa): dga' bo ci nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur zhing / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur bar khyod lnga lan gnyis lan gsum du gtad do// rjes su gtang ngo // yongs su gtang ngo //
380b6(brgyad stong pa): rjes su yongs su gtad ngo // kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten na ji srid du spyod pa de sring du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo 'di ltar de bzhin gshes/
380b7(brgyad stong pa): pas chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don
381a1(brgyad stong pa): pa dang / lung nong pa dang / ston pa dang / kha ton du byed pa dang / 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / DAg
381a2(brgyad stong pa): bdang / skyes dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag dang / khor lug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod ba rnam mang po dag nyis bkur rdzi bye
381a3(brgyad stong pa): bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed/ rjeng bar byed/ gsol bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral ba dang / dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang ma bral ba dang / dge 'dum pa
381a4(brgyad stong pa): ri gro byed ba dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung ni spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces
381a5(brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
381a6(brgyad stong pa): dngar mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 'gyod ngo // yongs su gtad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste sum cu
381a7(brgyad stong pa): gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs so//
